import React , {useState} from 'react'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import Slider from '../components/Slider'; import Overlay from '../components/Overlay'; import HomeProductsRange from '../components/HomeProductsRange'; import HomeHeader from '../components/HomeHeader'; import HomeAbout from '../components/HomeAbout'; import Promotions from '../components/Promotions'; import Kids from '../components/Kids'; import SliderModal from '../components/SliderModal'; export default function Home(props) { const [ showmodal , setShowModal ] = useState(false); const [showDonation , setShowDonation ] = useState(false); // //////////////// current data const [currentData ] = useState({ RecipeModal : RecipeModal , bigimg :"imgs/shwarmabig.png", smallimg :"imgs/shwarmasmall.png", heading :"Salmon Strips", }); // setCurrentData((current)=>{ // // if (props.activeTab === 1) { // // return { // // ...current, // // }; // // } else // if (props.activeTab === 2) { // return { // RecipeModal: RecipeModal, // bigimg: "imgs/shwarmabig.png", // smallimg: "imgs/shwarmasmall.png", // heading: "Sweet Shortbread", // }; // }else{ // return { // bigimg: "imgs/shwarmabig.png", // smallimg: "imgs/shwarmasmall.png", // heading: " salmon Strips", // }; // } // }) function booking (){ setShowModal(old=> !old) } function donation (){ setShowDonation(old=> !old) } const [ShowRecipeModal , setRecipeShowModal] = useState(false) function RecipeModal (){ setRecipeShowModal(old=> !old) } return ( <>

Book A Factory Tour

Keep on seeing how Baker's Inn products are made? Are you intrested in a feild trip day for your school's className? Get in touch with us to book a tour of our factory that is closest to you. Fill in the booking form and will get back to you.

Request A Donation

If you are holding an event that you wish to have us donate to we're more than glad to help. Fill in the donation form for us to best understand how we can increase your event's impact in the local community.{" "}

Request Product Donations

You can apply for product donations by completing this form, we will contact you should your application be successful. Please bear in mind that we will need at least 3 weeks’ notice to the date of your event
